H0.text: Peripheral nervous system is divided into two parts, the sensory division and the motor division.

H1.text: Physiological is the nervous system divided into two parts, the sensory division and the motor division.

H2.text: Developmental is the nervous system that is divided into two parts, the sensory division and the motor division.

H3.text: Central nervous system is divided into two parts, the sensory division and the motor division.

A4.text: Each of these can further be differentiated into a sensory and a motor sector.

A5.text: The peripheral nervous system can be divided into a somatic and an autonomic division.
